title: Calories in a Twinkie
meta_description: Discover calories in a Twinkie, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard Hostess Twinkie, cream-filled golden sponge cake, approximately 38 g serving size.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe changes, size, and expiration; always check packaging for the most accurate info.

quick_answer.text: One Twinkie contains about 150 calories, mostly from carbs and added sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Twinkie?
faqs.a: A standard Twinkie has about 150 calories.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Twinkie?
faqs.a: Approximately 26 g of carbs, with 19 g from sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Twinkie have any protein?
faqs.a: Only about 1 g of protein per Twinkie.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Twinkie?
faqs.a: Around 200 mg of sodium per serving.
They contain 5 g total fat, including 2.5 g saturated fat, but no trans fat or cholesterol.
